text: Hi guys, I'm going to show you how to perfectly prepare a pineapple.
Place your pineapple on it's side, and secure it in place with one hand
while you top and tail it, using a sawing action.
Then move in a barralling motion down around

the pineapple. We've left very little
flesh
on the skin. Cut through into nice
slices. If you've got a corer, use that

to take the centre of the pineapple out. If
you haven't then I'm using this cookie

Place the metal ring on top of the
pineapple over the core

and then push down. Give it a twist and
out comes the core.
If you want to turn it into chunks simply cut through.

And there you've got pineapple chunks.
That's how to perfectly prepare

a pineapple. If you want any more tips
click on the link.
